item.title: Dismembered bodies of 24 people found in mass grave in Mexico
item.description: Officials said the grave was located using drones with thermal cameras and ground-penetrating radars as well as canine teams.

item.title: How to watch Donald Trump's presidential inauguration
item.description: CBS News will carry the Trump Inauguration Day events live, beginning at 9 a.m. ET, across broadcast and streaming platforms.
